title: Typowiki
content: Why can I not access the Typowiki section? I want to contribute, but I get the ‘Access Denied’??
author: Hildebrant

comments.content: see my last post in the [bug thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110160413/http:/typophile.com/node/12063). Of course, this is just a “educated” guess.
